Name: Temporal Flux
Text: Any Turn: Play at any time to cancel any Action card just played by an opponent. Squadrons canceled in this way are discarded.

Name: Strategic Allocation
Text: Play to immediately draw three Action cards.
Rebalanced Text: Play to discard an Action card, then draw three Action cards.

Name: Catastrophic Damage
Text: Direct Hit Effect: Play on an enemy ship on which you just played a Direct Hit. That ship is immediately destroyed.

Name: Boarding Party
Text: Direct Hit Effect: Play on an enemy ship on which you just played a Direct Hit. You may take that fleet ship and add it to your fleet, placing it in a zone of your choice.

Name: Reinforcements
Text: Play to draw the top card from the fleet ship deck and add that ship to your fleet, placing it in a zone of your choice.
Rebalanced Text: Play to discard an Action card, then draw the top card from the fleet ship deck and add that ship to your fleet, placing it in a zone of your choice.

Name: Concussive Blast
Text: Direct Hit Effect: Play on an enemy ship on which you just played a Direct Hit. You may move all ships in the target ship's zone to any zones you like, so long as no more than 3 ships end up in any one zone.

Name: Evasive Action
Text: Any Turn: Play at any time to cancel a Blast, Squadron, or Direct Hit card played against one of your ships. Squadrons canceled by this card are returned to their owner's hand instead of discarded.

Name: Minefield
Text: Play on any fleet. Until the beginning of your next turn, ships in that fleet cannot maneuver, fire Blasts, or launch Squadrons.

Name: Fighter
Text:
Squadron (requires a carrier): Play on an enemy fleet ship in any zone.

Any Turn (requires a carrier): Play to cancel an attacking bomber or discard to cancel an attacking fighter.

Name: Bridge Hit
Text: Direct Hit Effect: Play on an enemy ship on which you just played a Direct Hit to take up to 3 cards at random from that player's hand.

Name: Spacedock
Text: Play to discard one Blast from one of your fleet ships (repairs one instance of Blast damage).

Name: Ramming Speed
Text: Play to sacrifice one of your fleet ships, turning it into a Blast that fires immediately from the ship's current zone. If it hits, it does damage equal to its speed.
Rebalanced Text: Play to sacrifice one of your fleet ships, turning it into a Blast that fires immediately from the ship's current zone. If it hits, it does damage equal to its speed times 2.

Name: Asteroids
Text: Play on any fleet. Until the beginning of your next turn, Blasts and Squadrons cannot be played on ships in that fleet.

Name: Bomber
Text: Squadron (requires a carrier): Play on an enemy ship in your carrier's zone.

Name: Direct Hit
Text: Play immediately after you successfully play a Blast on an enemy ship. You may immediately play a Direct Hit Effect on that ship, or you may fire another Blast at the same target from the same ship.
